events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund due to product size issues and dissatisfaction.
Support agent Lisa has been assigned to handle the refund case for the returned jacket.
Hello! I’m Lisa from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket. I’m here to help with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for us to process the refund?
My order number is #45321. The jacket is brand new, never worn, and still in the original plastic wrapping it arrived in.
Thank you for the information. I’ve initiated your refund process. You’ll receive a prepaid return shipping label via email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and for helping with the return label. I appreciate the smooth process.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Once we receive the returned jacket, your payment will be refunded within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to check if you have returned the jacket and if you need any further assistance from us.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday. Looking forward to receiving the refund soon. Thanks again for your help!
The refund has been processed successfully, and the case has been closed. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your recent support experience. Your feedback helps us improve.
